short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Global Search - Your Web Exploration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing One-Global-Search, a Chrome extension crafted for ultimate simplicity and efficiency. This extension uses Yahoo to deliver your search results.

By clicking "Add to Chrome," you agree to install the One-Global-Search extension, set it as your default search tool, and accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Privacy policy oneglobalsearch.com/privacy.html
Terms of use: oneglobalsearch.com/terms.html
